video.title: Transformers: Rescue Bots
video.synopsis: Follow the adventure of four young transformers, Heatwave, Chase, Blades and Boulder, and their human counterparts: a family of emergency responders.

episodes.synopsis: The Bots start their new mission, protecting the high-tech island of Griffin Rock, while learning from and working with a family of humans.
episodes.title: Family of Heroes

episodes.synopsis: The Bots try to convince their new human partners of their value when Cody, the youngest member of the Burns family, finds himself in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Dani gives Blades a new piece of equipment that puts them both on the front lines. But their sudden hotshot status threatens to unravel the team.
episodes.title: Hotshots

episodes.synopsis: A swarm of lobsters overruns the annual Griffin Rock summer festival. But Chase, Blades and Boulder have to battle them without Heatwave's help.
episodes.title: Flobsters on Parade

episodes.synopsis: A nosy reporter attempts to prove that aliens have invaded Griffin Rock, causing panic and threatening to expose the Rescue Bots' secret.
episodes.title: The Alien Invasion of Griffin Rock

episodes.synopsis: After Boulder learns about humans and their domesticated friends, he decides that the Rescue Bots need an animal mascot, too.
episodes.title: Walk on the Wild Side

episodes.synopsis: Cody supercharges his new go-kart so he can be a part of all the rescues. But in the process, he unleashes a swarm of futuristic nanites.
episodes.title: Cody on Patrol

episodes.synopsis: The Bots become unlikely baby sitters when Cody enlists their help to take care of Doc Greene's new prototype: a lifelike robo-baby.
episodes.title: Four Bots and a Baby

episodes.synopsis: When a snow machine goes haywire, Cody, his family and the Bots have to battle a blizzard, dig out the town and save Frankie.
episodes.title: Christmas in July

episodes.synopsis: While the Bots are deep-sea fishing, a shark starts attacking their equipment, and the team realizes that the beast may be more than it appears to be.
episodes.title: Deep Trouble

episodes.synopsis: To guard his lab from a mysterious intruder, Doc Greene reprograms the ferocious Dino Bot -- with disastrous consequences for Griffin Rock.
episodes.title: Return of the Dino Bot

episodes.synopsis: A new scientist on the island threatens to replace the Burns family and their Bots.
episodes.title: The Other Doctor

episodes.synopsis: When the MorBot replaces the Rescue Bots as the protectors of Griffin Rock, Cody has to find proof of Dr. Morocco's villainy.
episodes.title: The Reign of Morocco

episodes.synopsis: When a technological mishap miniaturizes the Bots, the Burns family must attempt to work without their partners.
episodes.title: Small Blessings

episodes.synopsis: Tenacious Cody finds a clue to a decades-old mystery and makes a startling underwater discovery.
episodes.title: The Griffin Rock Triangle

episodes.synopsis: When Cody and Chief go away on a camping trip, the Bots disobey Chief's orders and soon find themselves facing dangerous consequences.
episodes.title: Rules and Regulations

episodes.synopsis: A storm leaves Cody and the Rescue Bots stranded on an island where they uncover the answer to a centuries-old mystery.
episodes.title: The Lost Bell

episodes.synopsis: When a meteor affects the Rescue Bots, they get help from an unexpected visitor: Bumblebee.
episodes.title: Bumblebee to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Graham's decision to leave the Rescue Team is put on hold when a giant glob of green goo runs amok on Griffin Rock.
episodes.title: You've Been Squished!

episodes.synopsis: When the residents of Griffin Rock begin to disappear, it's up to Cody and the Bots to figure out why before they vanish, too.
episodes.title: Countdown

episodes.synopsis: The Rescue Bots find themselves battling unlikely foes: ghosts from Griffin Rock's past, who've returned to terrorize the island's inhabitants.
episodes.title: The Haunting of Griffin Rock

episodes.synopsis: The Rescue Team searches for a missing Chief and Chase, unaware that the two are trapped in an underground mine.
episodes.title: Little White Lies

episodes.synopsis: When mysterious earthquakes shake the island, the Rescue Bots step up to save the day. Unfortunately, Francine Greene records it all on camera.
episodes.title: Shake-Up

episodes.synopsis: Using a new techno-suit designed to protect him on rescue missions, Cody gains fame as an unlikely superhero: Rescue Boy.
episodes.title: Rescue Boy

episodes.synopsis: When Doc Greene experiments with a long-hidden time machine, the Bots, Cody and Frankie make an unexpected trip back to 1939 Griffin Rock.
episodes.title: It's a Bot Time

episodes.synopsis: After time-traveling to 1939, Cody, Frankie and the Rescue Bots return home to find that Griffin Rock has morphed into Moropolis.
episodes.title: Bot to the Future

episodes.synopsis: With the Rescue Bots' secret now known to Frankie and Doc, Cody must cope with a new family dynamic as well as an unpredictable teleportation device.
episodes.title: Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Frankie's contest entry not only threatens her friendship with Cody and the Bots, but the safety of the entire island.
episodes.title: Sky Forest

episodes.synopsis: Experimental technology turns Cody into a grown-up, affecting his standing in the family and on the rescue team.
episodes.title: One for the Ages

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious iceberg off the coast of Griffin Rock brings both danger and the interest of an old nemesis.
episodes.title: Tip of the Iceberg

episodes.synopsis: As the Autobots adjust to new group dynamics within their expanded lineup, the Decepticons launch a new scheme to clone an army of beasts.
episodes.title: A Virtual Disaster

episodes.synopsis: When the Bots and the Burnses fall into mysterious mind-controlled trances, Cody must find a way to wake them before he too is affected.
episodes.title: Spellbound

episodes.synopsis: The Team stars in a reality show in which Huxley Prescott will do anything to capture extreme danger on camera, including manufacturing emergencies.
episodes.title: Prescott's Bots

episodes.synopsis: Cody and the Rescue Bots help Kade face his nightmares, which come to life and threaten Griffin Rock.
episodes.title: Blame the Gremlins

episodes.synopsis: Cody and the Bots try to track down the legendary Maine Ridge Monster, only to discover he lurks in their midst.
episodes.title: Feed the Beast

episodes.synopsis: Cody's Uncle Woodrow pays a visit, resulting in the entire Rescue Team going on an unexpected mission below the surface of the earth.
episodes.title: What Lies Below

episodes.synopsis: Stuck underground and separated, the Rescue Bots and the Burnses, with Optimus Prime, must regroup to escape a primeval world of strange creatures.
episodes.title: What Rises Above

episodes.synopsis: When an experimental Space Elevator strands Doc and Graham in orbit, the Rescue Bots dust off their old ship and attempt a risky rescue.
episodes.title: Space Bots

episodes.synopsis: An out-of-control mechanical bull leads Cody and the Bots on an adventure through the mysterious Beam Box to an island where dangerous tech is stored.
episodes.title: The Island of Misfit Tech

episodes.synopsis: A new central computer is designed to keep everyone in Griffin Rock 100% safe, no matter what.
episodes.title: The Vigilant Town

episodes.synopsis: Finding themselves shackled to unusual partners during a nature hike, the Rescue Team battles a bevy of escaped snakes overrunning Griffin Rock.
episodes.title: Buddy System

episodes.synopsis: Cody takes the Bots on an adventure hike when strange events start happen. Could they be near the mythical Griffin's Nest?
episodes.title: In Search of the Griffin's Nest

episodes.synopsis: Chase goes rogue on an undercover mission as the Bots and Burns family do their best to save the island without using any modern technology.
episodes.title: Bots and Robbers

episodes.synopsis: Cody and the Bots find a stray dog who ends up joining the rescue team, but Priscilla Pynch has other plans for the pet.
episodes.title: Rescue Dog

episodes.synopsis: Doctor Morocco learns a devastating secret that threatens the Rescue Bots' mission. Optimus Prime guides Heatwave to acquire a surprising new ability.
episodes.title: Changes

episodes.synopsis: When rogue technology goes underground, the Rescue Team has to outwit and take down the terror lurking just beneath Griffin Rock's soil.
episodes.title: Movers and Shakers

episodes.synopsis: Blades feels left out when Bumblebee, on a mission to Griffin Rock, partners up with Dani.
episodes.title: Odd Bot Out

episodes.synopsis: While the Rescue Team is kept busy renovating a train tunnel from the Mainland, a mysterious Superhero watches over Griffin Rock.
episodes.title: The Griffin Rock Express

episodes.synopsis: Griffin Rock's most dastardly villains team up in a plan to kidnap the Rescue Bots and destroy the island.
episodes.title: Double Villany

episodes.synopsis: Wiped of their memories, the Rescue Bots are faced with saving Griffin Rock while believing the Burnses are their enemies.
episodes.title: Rise of the Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Optimus is forced to embrace his primal side when the Rescue Bots discover an island of dinosaurs and get trapped in a tar pit.
episodes.title: Land Before Prime

episodes.synopsis: As Optimus Prime tries to adjust to his new mode, a notorious big game hunter sets his sights on him, and only the Bots can rescue him.
episodes.title: Big Game

episodes.synopsis: When Doc's imaging chamber creates copies of Kade that are each an extreme form of his personality, Cody and the Bots must teach him about teamwork.
episodes.title: Too Many Kades

episodes.synopsis: The Rescue Bots and the Burns family board a ghost ship that carries a time machine and appears only once every 10 years.
episodes.title: Phantom of the Sea

episodes.synopsis: Chase is determined to complete a space mission involving an Energon Eater that the Rescue Bots were forced to abandon before they came to Earth.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: When Doc creates a giant dome to shield Griffin Rock from a hurricane, he inadvertently gives a computer the power to "protect" the island.
episodes.title: No Place Like Dome

episodes.synopsis: Doctor Morocco escapes and unleashes an army of metal-eating mutant ants on the people of Griffin Rock. But his plan might have a few holes in it.
episodes.title: Bugs in the System

episodes.synopsis: An encounter with a dangerous space nebula causes the Rescue Bots to switch bodies with the Burns family, but their missions cannot wait.
episodes.title: Switcheroo

episodes.synopsis: When Kade accidently ingests microscopic cleaning robots, the Rescue Bots must embark on an inner space voyage to save him.
episodes.title: Bot-Tastic Voyage

episodes.synopsis: To rebuild his game-hunting business, Colonel Quarry forces Doc to build more robotic dinosaurs, so Heatwave, Chase and Blades become DinoBots.
episodes.title: Quarry's Quarry

episodes.synopsis: The Bots discover a caveman preserved in ice, but their attempts to help him adjust to modern life cause chaos in Griffin Rock.
episodes.title: The Riders of Midwinter

episodes.synopsis: The Bots discover a caveman preserved in ice, but their attempts to help him adjust to modern life cause chaos in Griffin Rock.
episodes.title: Did You See What I Thaw?

episodes.synopsis: When monsters from Kade's favorite movie materialize in Griffin Rock, it is up to the DinoBots to corral the fearsome Kaiju.
episodes.title: The Attack of Humungado

episodes.synopsis: While the Burnses are stranded at sea by a swarm of stinging jellyfish, the Bots must contend with thieving miniature souvenir replicas of themselves.
episodes.title: All Bots Great and Small
